newsitem.title: ESTONIA: ESTONIA - NOON RADIO HEADLINES - JULY 8.
newsitem.headline: ESTONIA - NOON RADIO HEADLINES - JULY 8.

text.p: These were the main headlines from Estonia's Kuku radio noon news report on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- A court case involving Jaan Toots, former secretary general of the interior minstry, versus the government for wrongful dismissal starts in the Tallinn adminstrative court on Wednesday.
- Car drivers are refusing to give way to bicyles with two recent accidents caused by car drivers refusing to give bicycle riders the right to turn.
- German police have stopped a truck carrying 170 tonnes of illegally exported British beef bound for Russia.
